docs.summary: An element that displays your site's events.
Sets or gets the event category displayed in the element.
description: Using the **Display Events** menu, you can set Wix Events elements to display a specifc set of events or all the events in an [event category](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-events-creating-and-managing-event-categories).
By setting `categoryId` you can dynamically change which event category is displayed.
When `categoryId` is set to `null` or the page is reloaded, the events displayed
in the element default to whatever is selected in the **Display Events** menu.
The value of `categoryId` corresponds to the `ID` field for the event category in the
You can find this value either by opening the collection in the Collections Manager, or querying
the collection using the [Wix Data API](/wix-data).

examples.title: Set the event category to display
Display an event category when a button is clicked
